com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype

Class CaseStudy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype.CaseStudy

  • public class CaseStudy
extends java.lang.Object

    Case Study Class

    The CaseStudy class implements case study related functions. Static methods provide access to the case study database and allow the user to write/read from the database. The case study object allows the user to manipulate the case study objects and manipulate their data
    Since:
    0.2 //TODO: version numbers in github

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Context context
      The context which is necessary for loading the database (acceptable to pass the current activity with this)
      private static CaseStudyDatabase database
      The databse reference for reading/writing data (static so can be accessed as a singleton from any activity)
      private java.lang.String description
      The case study description
      private java.lang.String id
      The id of the Case Study, this must be unique and produced by the case study creator //TODO: generator code?
      private java.lang.String location
      The location on device or in the apk of the casestudy.json file
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the case study for user's to easily identify which case study they are using
      private int PRIMARY_KEY
      The primary key of teh case study in the database
      private java.lang.String type
      The type of case study location (local for case studies within the apk and disk for files loaded from device storage)

        Parameters:

        name - the display name of the case study
        type - the type of the case study (local = loaded from inside apk, disk = loaded from teh internal storage of the device)
        location - the location on the disk of the case study
